resources: Baseball Hall of Fame Quiz Submit /* Question 1 */ Who was part of the first class of players elected to the Hall of Fame? Bob Gibson Catfish Hunter Walter Johnson /* correct answer */ \"Shoeless\" Joe Jackson /* Question 2 */ Where is the Hall of Fame located? Cooperstown, NY /* correct answer */ Tupelo, MS Thousand Oaks, CA Troy, MI /* Question 3 */ Which association is responsible for Hall of Fame voting? NBA BBWAA /* correct answer */ NAACP HOFBA /* Question 4 */ What year did the Hall of Fame open? 1915 1939 /* correct answer */ 1943 1956 /* Question 5 */ Which of the following players is NOT in the Hall of Fame? Ty Cobb Sandy Koufax Micky Mantle Barry Bonds /* correct answer */ /* Question 6 */ Which team has the most players in the Hall of Fame? New York Yankees /* correct answer */ /* Question 7 */ Which of the following teams do not have any players in the Hall of Fame? Colorado Rockies /* correct answer */ Florida Marlins /* correct answer */ Detroit Tigers Cleveland Indians
